course_info.Course Title: PWM-Security: Security Risk Analysis (Assess and Address Security Risks)
Learning Outcomes: LO1: Apply basic risk identification techniques to detect tell-tale signs and symptoms of potential security threats.
LO2: Follow organizational procedures to identify risks by recognizing surveillance, inappropriate behavior, or potential threats.
LO3: Analyze situations and relate them to prior experiences to identify suspicious activities, attire, or explosive devices.
LO4: Collaborate with security teams to assess risks using established methods of risk analysis.
course_info.TSC Title: Security Risk Analysis Assess and Address Security Risks

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: A critical gap in the industry is the insufficient training in recognizing and responding to environmental factors that may pose security risks. Many security professionals lack the knowledge of how to assess the suitability of existing security systems and identify deficiencies that could lead to breaches. This lack of awareness can result in inadequate responses to evolving threats and vulnerabilities.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: This course provides in-depth knowledge on assessing security systems and identifying potential deficiencies. By equipping participants with the skills to analyze environmental factors and their impact on security, the course will enhance their ability to recommend appropriate measures to mitigate risks effectively.
